collection.name: ImageViewCreateInfo
collection.desc: Structure specifying parameters of a newly created image view.

member.name: baseLayer
member.desc: The first array layer accessible to the view.

member.name: levelCount
member.desc: The number of mipmap levels (starting from ''baseMipLevel'') accessible to the view.

member.name: baseMipmap
member.desc: The first mipmap level accessible to the view.

member.name: mipmapLevels
member.desc: The number of mipmap levels (starting from baseMipLevel) accessible to the view.

member.name: format
member.desc: A vulkan.Format describing the format and type used to interpret data elements in the image.

member.name: swizzleRed
member.desc: A vulkan.ComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the R component of the output vector.

member.name: swizzleGreen
member.desc: A vulkan.ComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the G component of the output vector.

member.name: swizzleBlue
member.desc: A vulkan.ComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the B component of the output vector.

member.name: swizzleAlpha
member.desc: A vulkan.ComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the A component of the output vector.
